name: Spring
description:
'''Spring''' (stylized in [[all caps]]) is a [[Malaysia|Malaysian]] ''[[rock kapak]]'' band from [[Seremban]], [[Negeri Sembilan]]. 

They began to reach the peak of popularity when the single from their second album titled ''Sampai Hati'' topped the Malaysian music charts in 1993. After a 16-year hiatus since 2003, they made a comeback in 2019 to entertain their fans.
